links.*: Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit

wikitext.*:
'''Stanley P. Baldwin''' (born [[1942]]) is a writer and teacher, currently living in Nebraska. He is a frequent contributor to scholarly series as [[wikipedia:SparkNotes|SparkNotes]] and [[Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit|CliffsNotes]]. He wrote about ''[[Beowulf (poem)|Beowulf]]'' and many others in the latter series, and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in the former.
